meanings.definition: The quality or state of being masterful.
meanings.sent1: Her masterfulness in painting was evident in every stroke.
meanings.sent2: His masterfulness in chess allowed him to win every game.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its masterfulness in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: The masterfulness of the conductor guided the orchestra to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The chef's masterfulness in creating flavors left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The ability to control or dominate a situation with skill and confidence.
meanings.sent1: The general's masterfulness in battle led to victory.
meanings.sent2: Her masterfulness in negotiations always resulted in favorable outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The magician's masterfulness made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The masterfulness of the captain steered the ship through the storm.
meanings.sent5: His masterfulness on the court made him the star player of the team.
